title: (4330) Brand New House for Sale, Piliyandala Kesbawa Road
details: Brand New House for Sale, Piliyandala Kesbawa Road, 4 Bedrooms, 3 Bath Rooms, Sitting, Dining, Pantry, With Cupboards fitted With Cooker Hob Hood, TV Room. Court Yard, Kitchen, Servant Room With Toilet, Balconies, Remote Door, Hot Water Rs: 148/= (Negotiable) 14.8 Million
